source.query:
select * from (SELECT 
      id AS supermarket_id,
      1 AS delivery_type_id
  FROM danube_supermarkets
  WHERE supermarket_type IN ('regular', 'regular_and_express')
  UNION
  SELECT 
      id AS supermarket_id,
      2 AS delivery_type_id
  FROM danube_supermarkets
  WHERE supermarket_type IN ('express', 'regular_and_express')) as ds order by supermarket_id asc;

SELECT 
	  REGEXP_REPLACE(MAX(COALESCE(spt.supplier_name,'')), '-[0-9]+$', '') AS name,
-- 	  UPPER(REGEXP_REPLACE(TRANSLATE(MAX(spt.supplier_name), ' ', '_'), '[^a-zA-Z0-9_]', '', 'g')) as code,
	  LEFT(COALESCE(spt.code, ''), 10) AS code,
	  MAX(spt.created_at) as created_at,
	  MAX(spt.updated_at) as updated_at,
	  MAX(spt.deleted_at) as deleted_at
	FROM 
	  (SELECT
		spree_product_id,
		MAX(CASE WHEN locale = 'en' THEN manufacturer END) as supplier_name,
		MAX(CASE WHEN locale = 'ar' THEN manufacturer END) as code,
		MAX(created_at) as created_at,
		MAX(updated_at) as updated_at,
		MAX(deleted_at) as deleted_at
	  FROM spree_product_translations
	  WHERE manufacturer IS NOT NULL
	  GROUP BY spree_product_id) as spt
	GROUP BY spt.code;

alter sequence supplier_id_seq restart with 1;
Select 'Altering Sequence ID' As Update;

SELECT
    st.id,
    st.parent_id AS parent_id,
    st.position,
    MAX(CASE WHEN stt.locale = 'en' THEN stt.name END) as name,
    COALESCE(MAX(CASE WHEN stt.locale = 'en' THEN stt.permalink END), '') as permalink,
    st.taxonomy_id,
    st.created_at,
    st.updated_at,
    MAX(CASE WHEN stt.locale = 'en' THEN stt.meta_title END) as meta_title,
    MAX(CASE WHEN stt.locale = 'en' THEN stt.meta_description END) as meta_description,
    MAX(CASE WHEN stt.locale = 'en' THEN stt.meta_keywords END) as meta_keywords,
    st.visible,
    Date(st.start_time) AS start_date,
    Cast( Substring(To_char(st.start_time, 'HH24:MI:SS'), 1, 8)  AS text) AS start_time,
    Date(st.end_time) AS end_date,
    Cast(Substring(To_char(st.end_time, 'HH24:MI:SS'), 1, 8) AS text) AS end_time,
    st.product_text_tag_en,
    st.product_text_tag_ar,
    COALESCE(st.tag_to_show, '') AS tag_to_show,
    st.visible_only_for_subscriber,
    MAX(CASE WHEN stt.locale = 'ar' THEN stt.name END) as name_ar,
    COALESCE(MAX(CASE WHEN stt.locale = 'ar' THEN stt.permalink END), '') as permalink_ar,
    MAX(CASE WHEN stt.locale = 'ar' THEN stt.meta_title END) as meta_title_ar,
    MAX(CASE WHEN stt.locale = 'ar' THEN stt.meta_description END) as meta_description_ar,
    MAX(CASE WHEN stt.locale = 'ar' THEN stt.meta_keywords END) as meta_keywords_ar,
    '' as pretty_name,
    '' as pretty_name_ar,
    'false' as featured
FROM
    spree_taxons st
LEFT JOIN spree_taxon_translations stt on stt.spree_taxon_id = st.id
GROUP BY
    st.id;

SELECT 
    a.taxon_id,
    CASE 
        WHEN au.name = 'Danube' THEN (SELECT id FROM spree_countries WHERE name = 'Saudi Arabia')
        ELSE aua.id 
    END AS country_id
FROM spree_tenants_taxons a
LEFT JOIN spree_tenants au ON a.tenant_id = au.id
LEFT JOIN spree_countries aua ON aua.name = au.name;

select 
    id,
    name,
    created_at,
    updated_at,
    key,
	true as visible
from spree_taxon_groups;

select 
    taxon_group_id,
    taxon_id,
    position
from spree_taxon_group_memberships;

select st.id,
        stt.name,
        st.created_at, 
        st.updated_at,
        st.position,
        1 AS category_id
from spree_taxonomies st
left join spree_taxonomy_translations stt
on st.id = stt.spree_taxonomy_id
and locale='en';

SELECT 
    spree_shipping_method_id AS delivery_option_id, 
    CASE 
        WHEN dtss.day_of_week = 0 THEN 'sunday' 
        WHEN dtss.day_of_week = 1 THEN 'monday' 
        WHEN dtss.day_of_week = 2 THEN 'tuesday' 
        WHEN dtss.day_of_week = 3 THEN 'wednesday' 
        WHEN dtss.day_of_week = 4 THEN 'thursday' 
        WHEN dtss.day_of_week = 5 THEN 'friday' 
        WHEN dtss.day_of_week = 6 THEN 'saturday' 
        ELSE '' 
    END AS day_of_week, 
    cast(dts.start_time as text), 
    cast(dts.end_time as text), 
    dts.enabled, 
    1 AS country_id 
FROM 
    danube_time_slots_schedules dtss 
LEFT JOIN 
    danube_time_slots dts ON dtss.time_slot_id = dts.id 
where dts.enabled
GROUP BY 
    dtss.time_slot_id, 
    dtss.spree_shipping_method_id, 
    dtss.day_of_week, 
    dts.start_time, 
    dts.end_time, 
    dts.enabled;

alter sequence time_slot_id_seq restart with 1;
Select 'Altering Sequence ID' as Update;

with cte as
(SELECT
  u.id,
  CASE
    WHEN u.deleted_at IS NOT NULL THEN TRUE
    ELSE FALSE
  END AS is_deleted,
  u.created_at,
  u.updated_at,
  LEFT(COALESCE(u.first_name, ''), 40) AS first_name,
  LEFT(COALESCE(u.last_name, ''), 40) AS last_name,
  u.email,
  'others' as gender,
  COALESCE(CONCAT('+', u.mobile_number_country_code),'') AS country_code,
  LEFT(COALESCE(CASE
    WHEN u.mobile_phone_number LIKE CONCAT(
      '+', u.mobile_number_country_code,
      '%'
      ) THEN SUBSTRING(
      u.mobile_phone_number,
      CHAR_LENGTH(u.mobile_number_country_code) + 2
      )
    WHEN u.mobile_phone_number LIKE CONCAT(u.mobile_number_country_code, '%') THEN SUBSTRING(
      u.mobile_phone_number,
      CHAR_LENGTH(u.mobile_number_country_code) + 1
      )
    ELSE COALESCE(u.mobile_phone_number, '')
  END, ''), 16) AS mobile_number,
  cast(u.dob as Text) as dob ,
  COALESCE(u.referral_code, '') AS referral_code,
  CASE WHEN u.locale ='en' THEN 1
	ELSE 2
   END AS language_id,
  a.city,
  a.latitude,
  a.longitude,
--   when country_id is '0' updated as '1' 
  CASE
    WHEN a.country_id='0' THEN '1'
    ELSE a.country_id
  END AS country_id,
  True as receive_marketing_promotions,
  case 
  	when sua.provider = 'google_oauth2' then 'google'
	else sua.provider end as login_type,
	sua.uid as social_id,
	0 as balance,
	u.blacklisted_at,
	u.blacklisted_reason,
	ROW_NUMBER() over (partition by u.id order by sua.updated_at desc) as rn

FROM spree_users u
LEFT JOIN spree_user_addresses ua ON u.id = ua.user_id AND ua.default = TRUE
LEFT JOIN spree_addresses a ON ua.address_id = a.id
left join spree_user_authentications sua on u.id = sua.user_id 
ORDER BY u.id ASC)

select id, is_deleted, created_at, updated_at, first_name, last_name, email, gender, country_code, mobile_number, dob, referral_code, language_id, city,
	latitude, longitude, country_id, receive_marketing_promotions, login_type, social_id, balance, blacklisted_at, blacklisted_reason
	from cte 
	where rn = 1;
select max(updated_at) as max_updated_date from public.user;

query.value:
with cte as
(SELECT
  u.id,
  CASE
    WHEN u.deleted_at IS NOT NULL THEN TRUE
    ELSE FALSE
  END AS is_deleted,
  u.created_at,
  u.updated_at,
  LEFT(COALESCE(u.first_name, ''), 40) AS first_name,
  LEFT(COALESCE(u.last_name, ''), 40) AS last_name,
  u.email,
  'others' as gender,
  COALESCE(CONCAT('+', u.mobile_number_country_code),'') AS country_code,
  LEFT(COALESCE(CASE
    WHEN u.mobile_phone_number LIKE CONCAT(
      '+', u.mobile_number_country_code,
      '%'
      ) THEN SUBSTRING(
      u.mobile_phone_number,
      CHAR_LENGTH(u.mobile_number_country_code) + 2
      )
    WHEN u.mobile_phone_number LIKE CONCAT(u.mobile_number_country_code, '%') THEN SUBSTRING(
      u.mobile_phone_number,
      CHAR_LENGTH(u.mobile_number_country_code) + 1
      )
    ELSE COALESCE(u.mobile_phone_number, '')
  END, ''), 16) AS mobile_number,
  cast(u.dob as Text) as dob ,
  COALESCE(u.referral_code, '') AS referral_code,
  CASE WHEN u.locale ='en' THEN 1
	ELSE 2
   END AS language_id,
  a.city,
  a.latitude,
  a.longitude,
--   when country_id is '0' updated as '1' 
  CASE
    WHEN a.country_id='0' THEN '1'
    ELSE a.country_id
  END AS country_id,
  True as receive_marketing_promotions,
  case 
  	when sua.provider = 'google_oauth2' then 'google'
	else sua.provider end as login_type,
	sua.uid as social_id,
	0 as balance,
	u.blacklisted_at,
	u.blacklisted_reason,
	ROW_NUMBER() over (partition by u.id order by sua.updated_at desc) as rn

FROM spree_users u
LEFT JOIN spree_user_addresses ua ON u.id = ua.user_id AND ua.default = TRUE
LEFT JOIN spree_addresses a ON ua.address_id = a.id
left join spree_user_authentications sua on u.id = sua.user_id 
ORDER BY u.id ASC)

select id, is_deleted, created_at, updated_at, first_name, last_name, email, gender, country_code, mobile_number, dob, referral_code, language_id, city,
latitude, longitude, country_id, receive_marketing_promotions, login_type, social_id, balance, blacklisted_at, blacklisted_reason
from cte 
where rn = 1
and updated_at > '@{variables('max_updated_date')}';
